education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

experience.context: Rapid promotion from Founding Engineer to CTO occurred because I became invaluable to the team, acting as the former CTO's right hand. When they left, I was the natural successor due to my deep familiarity with all services and team workflows. Team grew to 22 people at its peak, where I managed roughly 12 engineers. Built state-of-the-art inference infrastructure for generative AI. Pivoted from B2C product (thousands of users, conversations in >158 countries) to enterprise B2B solutions after struggling to find PMF. Organized and ran AGI Interface Summit, previewing technology to 80 people in San Francisco.

roles.title: Chief Technology Officer
bullets: Leading technical strategy for a pre-seed startup valued at $10M backed by Village Global, Jeff Dean, and Nvidia's Inception
Spearheaded strategic partnerships and integrations with NVIDIA, Google, AWS, and Azure to validate technical assumptions and accelerate product adoption
Secured multiple 5-figure enterprise contracts by leading end-to-end customer evaluations spanning technical discovery, solution design, and enterprise security requirements
Managed 12-engineer team through B2C to B2B pivot, overseeing engineering processes, code quality, and delivery timelines

roles.title: Head of Engineering
bullets: Implemented agentic solutions including knowledge retrieval, MCP integration, and interactive screen features, resulting in a significant increase in pilot user engagement and retention
Reduced GPU inference costs by 75% without affecting broader performance by optimizing model infrastructure and enabling distributed, parallelizable inferencing solutions
Organized and executed AGI Interface Summit in San Francisco, previewing technology to 80 industry professionals and gathering critical feedback

roles.title: Founding Software Engineer
bullets: Architected distributed, real-time video-conferencing AI systems using WebRTC and Triton; rapidly grew product to 1,000+ users with hundreds of AI conversations weekly
Built a B2B web-app for tailoring real-time AI experiences, owning the React/TypeScript frontend, backend/infra, and Kubernetes orchestration
Delivered AI conversations in >158 countries globally, demonstrating international scalability and infrastructure resilience

roles.title: Software Engineer
bullets: Integrated Walmart Canada into analytics platform, eliminating multi-million-dollar third-party costs
Built data pipelines with Airflow/BigQuery and improved frontend performance for a web app serving 60k daily users

Developed and deployed critical infrastructure components using Java Spring for the Global Workforce Management Demand team, directly facilitating the automatic scheduling of 2.3 million associates worldwide

roles.title: Software Engineering Intern
bullets: Spearheaded Java Spring microservice for critical task automation, saving 10s of monthly labor hours
Reduced tech debt by 30% across team projects through legacy code refactoring, improving development velocity and lowering maintenance costs

roles.title: Teaching Assistant - Discrete Mathematics
bullets: Mentored 40+ students in discrete mathematics concepts including logic, set theory, and graph theory, facilitating a deeper understanding of computer science and algorithm fundamentals
Collaborated with faculty to grade assignments and exams, providing detailed feedback to support student learning and academic success

roles.title: Software Development Intern
bullets: Optimized C# and SQL stored procedures for W-2 services, reducing report generation time by up to 50%

roles.title: Software Engineering Intern
bullets: Pioneered use of OpenVINO, YoloV5, and TensorRT to increase vision-inferencing AI performance by 400%+ across all products
Managed two vital projects and developed 5,000+ lines of production code, decreasing reliance on shortage-ridden hardware by 50%

projects.name: MedMate - Healthcare Assistant App
bullets: Built a comprehensive healthcare mobile app that records and transcribes notes from doctor visits in 30+ languages, automatically converting conversations to the user's native language
Implemented semantic search functionality for medications with intelligent warnings about potential drug interactions, helping users avoid dangerous medication combinations
Created medication tracking system enabling users with complex medication regimens to monitor and manage their medications more effectively
Developed full mobile application with React Native frontend and Python Flask backend, addressing healthcare accessibility and medication management challenges

projects.name: SiteInSight - Property Value Estimation
bullets: Built a web application using machine learning to estimate property values throughout Dallas based on multiple variables including zipcode, bedroom count, bathroom count, and square footage
Implemented an intelligent deal-finding system that identifies undervalued properties where users could make a profit from purchasing
Developed web frontend with Svelte and machine learning backend with R, demonstrating proficiency across multiple programming language ecosystems
Applied regression and statistical modeling techniques to real estate data, delivering actionable insights for property investment decisions

projects.name: Carbon-Optimized Daily Scheduler
bullets: Built a mobile app that analyzes user's daily habits and optimizes schedules to reduce CO2 emissions using AI

Implemented an agent-based system that takes user schedules and returns optimized plans recommending high-energy activities during times of peak renewable energy generation and avoiding driving during high-traffic periods
Created a gamified leaderboard system showing users who achieved the greatest emissions reductions, promoting engagement and competition
Developed full mobile application with React Native frontend and Python FastAPI backend, delivering an end-to-end environmental impact tool

projects.name: Redwood - Intelligent PDF Learning Assistant
projects.tech_stack: Python, Spacy, TopicRank, Directed Acyclic Graphs (DAG), Topological Sorts
bullets: Built a webapp that uses NLP (Spacy, TopicRank) to analyze topic relationships across pages of large PDFs such as textbooks
Created a directed acyclic graph (DAG) representing concept dependencies, enabling users to learn specific topics without reading irrelevant content
Implemented topological sorting algorithms to generate foundational learning paths, building understanding from ground up rather than arbitrary page order
Delivered a comprehensive reimagining of how people understand and learn concepts from educational materials, going beyond traditional chatbot approaches
Recognized by judges for entirely novel application of NLP and graph theory to personalized education

projects.name: Amelia - AI Voice Assistant for Car Maintenance
projects.tech_stack: Python, Google Voice Web Interface, Virtual Audio Devices, Agentic AI
bullets: Built one of the first truly generative AI voice agents before modern tools like Pipecat existed, pioneering agentic voice technology
Developed custom telephone integration using virtual audio devices with Google Voice's web interface, as Twilio lacked voice AI integrations at the time
Created subagent system to analyze car maintenance needs and proactively text users when preventative maintenance was required, then called users to explain and assist
Achieved unprecedented accessibility by making the system work from any phone device, including payphones - a rare feat for AI at the time
Recognized by judges for meeting users where they are at with highly accessible technology that required no smartphone or app

projects.name: Sparrow Link
bullets: 1st place Engineering Capstone project at The University of Texas at Dallas
Developed a remote research platform for Spark Biomedical, accelerating clinical trials and data collection for their neuro-stimulation device, and enabling secure remote access to medical technology

achievements.title: 1st Place Engineering Capstone Project at UTD
Google Developer Student Club President (2023 - 2024)
achievements.description: Organized numerous events and workshops including AI workshops, grew membership by 20%, led special initiatives such as Q&A with GitHub co-founder Chris Wanstrath and recruiting workshops with Sigma, and connected with local companies to expand club opportunities

achievements.title: HackPrinceton 2023 Finalist (Redwood - Intelligent PDF Learning Assistant)
HackRICE 13 2nd Place Environmental Hack (Carbon-Optimized Daily Scheduler)
HackUTA 2023 Overall 2nd Place (Amelia - AI Voice Assistant)
WEHack 2023 2nd Place Machine Learning (SiteInSight - Property Value Estimation)
